TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsAttribute extends System.Attribute implements class System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior
Public NotInheritable Class AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsAttribute Inherits Attribute Implements IServiceBehavior
public ref class AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsAttribute sealed : Attribute, System::ServiceModel::Description::IServiceBehavior

summary.span: 应用于 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 服务，指示该服务是否可以在 ASP.NET 兼容代码中运行。

span.span: Applied to a Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) service to indicate whether that service can be run in ASP.NET compatibility code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在应用于服务实现类时，此属性可指示该服务是否需要 [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] 兼容模式，或是否支持为宿主应用程序域 (AppDomain) 启用该兼容模式。When applied to a service implementation class, this attribute indicates whether this service requires or supports [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibility mode to be enabled for the hosting application domain (AppDomain). AppDomains 宿主 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 服务可在两种不同的宿主模式下运行：AppDomains hosting [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] services can run in two different hosting modes: - 混合传输模式（默认）：在这种模式下，[!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 服务不参与 [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] HTTP 管线。Mixed Transports Mode (Default): In this mode, [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] services do not participate in the [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] HTTP pipeline. 这可保证 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 服务行为的一致性，使其不受宿主环境和传输的影响。This guarantees that a [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] service behaves consistently, independent of hosting environment and transport. - [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] 兼容模式：在这种模式下，[!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 服务以与 ASMX 服务类似的方式参与 [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] HTTP 管线。 Compatibility Mode: In this mode, [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] services participate in the [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] HTTP pipeline in a manner similar to ASMX services. [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] 功能（例如，文件授权、URL 授权和 HTTP 会话状态）适用于在此模式下运行的 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 服务。 features such as File Authorization, UrlAuthorization, and HTTP Session State are applicable to [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] services running in this mode. 宿主模式由应用程序级配置标记 `aspNetCompatibilityEnabled` 控制。The hosting mode is controlled by the application-level configuration flag `aspNetCompatibilityEnabled`. `` `` `` 默认情况下，此标记为 `false`，因此，除非明确选择使用 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 兼容模式，否则 [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] 服务将在混合传输模式下运行。This flag is `false` by default and thus [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] services run in the Mixed Transports Mode unless you explicitly opt into the [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibility mode. [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crdefault-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] 兼容性模式下，请参阅[ <serviceHostingEnvironment>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicehostingenvironment.md)。 [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibility mode, see [<serviceHostingEnvironment>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicehostingenvironment.md). 使用 属性可以实现此目的。Use the property to do this. 运行时，应用程序可以通过检查静态属性 [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] 的值，来检测是否启用了 兼容模式。At runtime, applications can detect if [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibility mode is enabled by checking the value of the static property . ## Examples 服务开发人员可以确保其服务仅运行在 ASP.NET 兼容模式下通过设置属性到下面的示例中所示Service developers can ensure that their service is only run in ASP.NET Compatibility Mode by setting the property on the to as shown in the following example [!code-csharp[S_AspNetCompatibility#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_aspnetcompatibility/cs/service.cs#1)] [!code-vb[S_AspNetCompatibility#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_aspnetcompatibility/vb/service.vb#1)] [!code-csharp[S_AspNetCompatibility#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_aspnetcompatibility/cs/service.cs#2)] [!code-vb[S_AspNetCompatibility#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_aspnetcompatibility/vb/service.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::ServiceModel::Activation::AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsMode RequirementsMode { System::ServiceModel::Activation::AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsMode get(); void set(System::ServiceModel::Activation::AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsMode value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置该服务所需的 [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] 兼容级别。

span.span: Gets or sets the level of [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibility required by the service.

value.span: 指示该服务所需的 兼容程度的 [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)]。

span.span: The that indicates the services required degree of [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibility.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可以在代码中设置宿主模式。Use the property to set the hosting mode in code. 还可以通过设置应用程序级配置标记 `aspNetCompatibilityEnabled` 来完成此操作。This can also be done by setting an application-level configuration flag `aspNetCompatibilityEnabled`. [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/includes/crdefault-md.md)] [<serviceHostingEnvironment>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicehostingenvironment.md)。 [<serviceHostingEnvironment>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicehostingenvironment.md). 运行时，应用程序可以通过检查静态属性 [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] 的值，来检测是否启用了 兼容模式。At runtime, applications can detect whether [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibility mode is enabled by checking the value of the static property . ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_AspNetCompatibility#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_aspnetcompatibility/cs/service.cs#2)] [!code-vb[S_AspNetCompatibility#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_aspnetcompatibility/vb/service.vb#2)]

exception.span: 该值不是 的有效值。

span.span: The value is not a valid one for the .

summary.span: 添加绑定元素可访问的自定义数据以支持协定的实现。

span.span: Adds custom data that the binding elements can access to support the implementation of the contract.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法支持 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 基础结构，不能在代码中直接使用。This method supports the [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

summary.span: 检查宿主类型与 [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] 兼容性要求是否一致。

span.span: Checks that the type of hosting is consistent with the [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibility requirements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法支持 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 基础结构，不能在代码中直接使用。This method supports the [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

exception.span: 服务宿主与 [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] 兼容性要求不兼容。

span.span: The service hosting is not compatible with the [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibility requirements.
